body: You tap into the unthinkable void between the stars and cause a single living creature within 30 feet to become confused for 1 round. A successful Will save negates the effect. This is a mind-affecting compulsion effect. At 7th level, the confusion lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
name: Gift of Madness
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Oracle/Mysteries/Dark Tapestry/Revelations/Gift of Madness
